description:
Have you heard the chatter about Stellar Blade lately? It's all about Eve, the captivating main protagonist. But let's not forget about the game itself. Is it a worthwhile action game? Should we be excited? Let's hear what Brett Medlock has to say!

#stellarblade #ps5 #playstation5

title: Stellar Blade is More Than a Pretty Face
